review: Actors acting were too good and funy . Comedian cyrus was there as special appearance  but this movie as copied from Holly movie las Vegas it's remake of that movie . Senior citizens were went for solo trip in Mauritius they were flirting with young girl and having party in beach and that song was playing bum bum mere hum dum kich mere hum dum I fell like vomating it sang by neha kakar and honey singh rubbish lyrics.

It is a nice comedy... It would not be fair to compare it with original Shaukeen.. Whuch was a classic comedy.

The story idea is based on the original but treatment is very modern. I feel Delhi audience will like it more since characters are Delhi based and Delhi flavour can be seen in the movie 
 movie
Everyone in this film tried their best to make it a comedy drama film and I’ll not say that it’s a must watch movie but also not a movie which comes in the “should never watch “ category.
This is my favorite movie. I love all cast in this movie.
This movie is all about akshay kumar stardom...
If you can digest this movie, then you can digest lead my friend. . .
